std_narrative.citation:
Hans, son of George Philip Samsen & Elder Wilse, was born on 14 April 1906 and baptised on 27 May 1906 in Uranienborg, Oslo, Norge. '''Baptism''': "Norway Church Records, 1815-1938"
[https://www.myheritage.com/research/record-10926-5577902/hans-peter-lund-wilson-in-norway-church-records MyHeritage Record] (accessed 6 May 2021)
